rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious area with minimalist Brutalist design using raw concrete finishes, complemented by large glass facades for natural light. The living area integrates an open-plan concept adjoining a semi-outdoor space.
rooms.vastu_consideration: North-east corner recommended for living spaces to promote positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen and Dining Area
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with industrial finishes and durable materials. Incorporates a dining area that flows into the living space, with ample ventilation.
rooms.vastu_consideration: South-east corner recommended for food preparation areas to harness energy.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space featuring built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating. Designed with abundant natural light from strategically placed openings.
rooms.vastu_consideration: North-west corner recommended to encourage wisdom and knowledge.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: A luxury outdoor swimming pool area, designed with robust concrete finishes. Includes adjoining relaxation zones with seating.
rooms.vastu_consideration: East side placement to ensure morning sun and positive energies.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1 (Duplex)
rooms.description: Dedicated bedroom area with a focus on quietness and privacy. Features a built-in closet, minimalist furniture, and a balcony adjoining the room.
rooms.vastu_consideration: South-west corner recommended for bedrooms to balance energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2 (Duplex)
rooms.description: Dedicated bedroom area with ample space, built-in storage solutions, and a private balcony.
rooms.vastu_consideration: North-west corner recommended for restful energy.

rooms.name: Balcony Common Area
rooms.description: Shared outdoor space connecting both duplex bedrooms to enhance ventilation and allow relaxation with natural light.
rooms.vastu_consideration: Strategically placed to ensure balance between private balconies.
